main event: A resident in Petersburg, Alaska reported seeing a bright, chrome-like object changing directions and moving rapidly in the sky for approximately 10-15 minutes on December 8, 1960.
interesting points: The object was visible from the observer's residence and was described as oval in shape., The object was observed changing directions and heights rapidly., The sighting occurred during clear and cold weather conditions at nighttime., The report was made to the state police, with the observer visibly shaken after the experience., The UFO was classified as a satellite exhibiting erratic maneuvers, but further identification could not be determined.
witness description: a resident of Petersburg who requested anonymity
